name: Second Life
description: Second Life Plastics is a social enterprise dedicated to ocean plastic collection and recycling, actively collaborating with vulnerable island communities across Thailand. We are the first Verra-certified plastic project globally. To date, we have successfully collected and recycled over 4 million kilograms of plastic. We are one of the biggest projects worldwide in this field and have provided support to more than 150 collectors on behalf of brands like Caudalie, Clarins, Symrise, and MARS since 2020. Second Life Plastics is a social enterprise dedicated to ocean plastic collection and recycling, actively collaborating with vulnerable island communities across Thailand. We are the first Verra-certified plastic project globally.
